These release notes provide details about the changes in the Spring '22 release of Vlocity Insurance Application Suite.

Property and Casualty Application for Vlocity Insurance Application Suite:
All new commercial products for quoting and rating, enhancements to the policyholder Experience site, new claim recovery process and more.
Group Voluntary Benefits Application for Vlocity Insurance Application Suite:
A brand new portal for agents to create quotes, census, and contracts.
title: Vlocity Insurance Application Suite Spring '22 Release Notes
